summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FileSolved document services platform. Backend APIs working excellently (90.9% success rate). Frontend pages load correctly with functional navigation, admin dashboard, and service selection. Only minor issues found with file upload interaction and expected PayPal/email configuration gaps.

configuration_issues.issue: PayPal secret not configured in environment variables

mocked_services.note: Expected - API key not provided yet

ui_bugs.issue: HTML overlay intercepting click events on file upload
ui_bugs.impact: Users may have difficulty uploading files

passed_tests: Services API returns all 8 services with correct pricing
Admin dashboard analytics and orders display
Homepage loads with hero section and services
Services page displays all document services
Upload page service dropdown loads from API
Customer form fields present and functional
FAQ and Contact pages load correctly
Admin login page and authentication flow
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix file upload dropzone overlay issue preventing smooth file uploads. Consider adding PAYPAL_SECRET to environment if payment testing is needed. All core functionality is working well.
